title: Ghost Moon
author: Butlin, Ron
snippet: 'I will,' she heard herself reply out loud, 'just watch me!'Two days later Maggie saw the handwritten notice in the window of Fusco's Fish Restaurant on Gorgie Road, and went straight in. Perfect timing.

title: Ghost Moon
author: Butlin, Ron
snippet: 'Came this morning, Tony  says.' Margaret Davies, c/o Fusco's Fish Restaurant, Gorgie Road, Edinburgh. Firm handwriting, neat fountain pen.
